name: big_arrow_left
before_rect_change: context.dxabc = context.abc.x - context.x;context.dyabc = context.abc.y - context.y;context.dycde = context.cde.y - context.y;
after_rect_change: context.abc = {x: context.x + context.dxabc, y:context.y+context.height*0.25};context.abc = {x: context.y + context.dyabc, y:context.y+context.height*0.25};context.cde = {x: context.y + context.dycde, y:context.y+context.height*0.5};
